sentences.en: Dearland gains inspiration from beauty and create happiness from inspiration unfailingly and unflagingly.
sentences.cn: 而眼前的蝶依斓,从美丽处获得灵感,从灵感处创造幸福,不倦不悔,孜孜以求.

sentences.en: Foreigners unfailingly fall in love with the place.
sentences.cn: 外国人都爱上了这个地方。

sentences.en: He was unfailingly polite to customers.
sentences.cn: 他对顾客总是以礼相待。

sentences.en: His relations with colleagues, differences of opinion notwithstanding, were unfailingly friendly.
sentences.cn: 尽管有意见分歧，他和同事们一直关系融洽。

sentences.en: In order to turn off thyristor unfailingly, the inverter circuIt'should be rebuilt.
sentences.cn: 为了保证可控硅可靠关断, 需要改造逆变电路主回路.

sentences.en: She was unfailingly courteous and helpful.
sentences.cn: 她无论什么时候都彬彬有礼,乐于助人.

sentences.en: The YTM series electric motors work very well with good pull - in torque which unfailingly operates.
sentences.cn: YTM系列电机有着较好的性能指标,具有较高的起动转矩,运行可靠.

words.tran_cn: 经久不衰的；可靠的；无穷尽的
可靠地；无穷尽地；不倦地

trans.tran_cn: 无穷尽地，经久不衰地，可靠地
